content: this layering tank top comes in nine sizes xs through 5xl and is perfect for any season the layering tank top is a beginner-friendly crochet pattern designed for effortless style through every season wear it solo during warm summer days or layer it under a flannel or denim jacket for the perfect fall look materials size 3 cotton blend yarn dillydally 1 used crochet hook in size 3mm or needed to obtain gauge sizing xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl 1 https //tidd ly/3krkeos
